plot: An unfortunate foot-gnawing accident leaves Len in a sticky situation. Can Ant find a way to rescue his mischievous friend?
title: Ant & Len
plot_es: An unfortunate foot-gnawing accident leaves Len in a sticky situation. Can Ant find a way to rescue his mischievous friend?
